item.description:
Trivia is back! And at a brand new time!

Come join us as our team demonstrates our lack of trivia knowledge while enjoying the fine food and drinks at this local establishment. You don't have to be a master of trivia, and we get to huddle (as a team) before turning in any answers, so there is *NO* pressure.

Gas Lamp Grille Features: Great Food, Exotic Beers, Music, sports on their several large-screen plasma televisions, and most importantly, yours truly!

Trivia starts around 9:00 and goes pretty quickly. We'll meet at 8:00 so we have time to chat and taunt the other teams with our patented triple Ts (Trivia Trash-Talking).
item.how_to_find_us: Meet near the Bar - Adam is 5'8", cell: (401) 699-7304
item.name: The Gas Lamp Grille - EARLY Monday Trivia
